Package net.sf.click.extras.panel

Provides a method to surround other Click controls with a template.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Panel Provides for a "Panel" which is simply a template and adds pass through methods to the Page for adding Control and Model objects.
 

Class Summary
BasicPanel A simple implementation of a Panel, that will render a basic panel.
ListPanel Provides a method of adding multiple panels that will be listed out in a vertical fashion, each panel being evaluated via Velocity's #parse(), and by default, surrounded with a <div> with the id of the list panel when instantiated.
TabbedPanel Provides a way to add multiple sub-panels in 'tabs'.
 

Package net.sf.click.extras.panel Description

Provides a method to surround other Click controls with a template. Panels implement the Panel interface to allow proper template rendering. Panels are processed by the Page it is associated with.

Using panels is similar to using Tiles in Struts, but more programmatic (via Java) than from an external configuration file.
